title: A History of Underground Comics
description: One of the best known early (originally 1974) retrospectives of Underground Comix, in a higher production values printing. A few artists featured are Robert Crumb, Gilbert Shelton, Rand Holmes, Willy Murphy, Joel Beck, Frank Stack, Skip Williamson, Dave Sheridan, Larry Todd, Bill Griffith, and so many others. This title is a "Must" for any serious Underground Comix collection.
author: Mark James Estren
